trait.name: Light Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing, as long as the areas on both sides of the space aren't dark or dimly fit. if a creature that the elemental is not friendly towards touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) radiant damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) radiant damage and must succeed a {@dc 15} dextertty Saving throw or be outlined in light as if it were affected by the spell {@spell Faerie Fire} for 1 minute. Any attack roll against a creature that is outlined in light by the elemental has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the creature can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds magical bright fight in a 30 ft. radius, and nonmagical bright light in an additional 30 ft.

trait.name: Aura Of Luck (3/day)
entries: If a creature that the elemental is friendly towards fails a saving throw or an attack roll within 30 ft, of the elemental, that creature can reroll the 'saving throw or attack roll

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Burst
entries: The elemental emits magical, shining energy. Each creature of its choice ina 10 ft. radius Must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage end {@condition blinded} on a failed save, or half as much damage and not {@condition blinded} on a successful one. The {@condition blinded} creature makes a save at the end of its tums, and is no longer {@condition blinded} on 3 success.
